downloadTitle: Recycling and refurbishment options for Microsoft devices
downloadDescription: This infographic outlines some of the multiple options users have to responsibly repurpose, refurbish, and/or recycle devices, such as Trade-in Programs, Microsoft Authorized Refurbishers, and Mailback Recycling programs.
detailsSection: This infographic outlines some of the multiple options users have to responsibly repurpose, refurbish, and/or recycle devices, such as Trade-in Programs, Microsoft Authorized Refurbishers, and Mailback Recycling programs.
systemRequirementsSection: This guide is available in PDF format. To access the file. you will need Microsoft Edge, Adobe Reader, or a compatible PDF reader.
installInstructionSection: Click the Download button and open the file directly or save it to your local machine for future reference.
